titleStmt.title: A pleasant and vvitty comedy: called, A new tricke to cheat the Divell . Written by R.D. Gent
New tricke to cheat the Divell
titleStmt.author: Davenport, Robert, fl. 1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Okes, for Humphrey Blunden, and are to be sold at his shop in Corne-hill, next to the Castle Taverne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Corne-hill, next to the Castle Taverne
